title: No charges expected after 13-year-old shot in leg
content:
LOUISVILLE, Ky. —
A teenager was taken to a hospital after he was accidentally shot in the leg.
It happened at around 12:30 p.m. Wednesday in the 3000 block of University Road.
Police said two boys, ages 15 and 13, were playing with the gun when it went off.
The 13-year-old was shot in the leg and taken to University Hospital. He's expected to be OK.
While the case is still being investigated, no charges are expected to be filed.
